message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for a price of $10000. I think this is a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality product at a competitive price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I'd like to try to get closer to my budget.

I understand that $9500 is a good offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9800. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a compromise. This price still reflects the value of the product, but it's a bit more in line with your budget.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $9200. I think this is a fair price for both of us.

I understand that $9200 is still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $9150. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make a small counteroffer of $9000. I think this is the best price we can both agree on.
